name: Retrope
description:
Retrope is a box of four endless arcade retro games with Skillz game platform support. Swipe down enemies quickly or tease your brain with simple logic in countless levels.

Use a super easy "one-swipe to create a line" mechanics, which has a different effect in each game.

Challenge yourself how fast or clever you can swipe!

Major Features:

  • Skillz game platform – Play against other players
  • Four different games in one
  • Endless action in each
  • Easy one-swipe controls
  • Retro art and crazy boooom effects
  • Quick to play levels (if you only have 5 minutes)
